::Ender::
    He leaned back in his chair and put his hands behind his neck.  
He felt a little out of place in a meeting of the great leaders of 
the Predacons.  He spoke quietly to himself.  "I wonder what exactly 
my file said.  I don't even have a room yet, and I have a file."  
Then, to the rest of the table.  "Pardon the thoughts of a lowly 
tactician, but since we are talking about the survival of your 
comander.  Wouldn't it be easier for you to just tell us what you're 
thinking so that I, or whomever you may choose, can formulate a plan 
of attack.  Instead of beating around the proverbial bush."
